item.title: Help?
item.dc:creator: @P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut `Lewk_
item.description:
@P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut wrote:

Well…
i have a ghorrock spell…
obviuisly.
and i want it so you when you tele.
it switches to run…
this is what i have.

[code] if (s == “Ghorrock”){

    teleX = 3091;
    teleY = 3963;

playerEnergy = 40;
playerLevel[3] = 40;
if(stoprunning)
setconfig(173, 0);
isRunning2 = false;
stoprunning = false;

sendFrame126(playerEnergy +"%", 149);

sendFrame106(12);
sendMessage(“You need run on at ALL Times… please click run. got energy owned by admin”);
sendMessage(" plus… you cannot mass… It will take a while =D l0l");
addSkillXP((650*playerLevel[playerMagic]), playerMagic);
newheightLevel = 0;
}
RemoveAllWindows();
closeInterface();
teleport();
actionTimer = 10;
}[/code]
i added the
-if(stoprunning)
setconfig(173, 0);
isRunning2 = false;
stoprunning = false;-
But it still doesnt work…
Can anyone help me?
im willing to pay back
Please.
Dont flame me for posting this in the questions section…
Someone told me to post here
